actions.committee: Senate Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Capital Planning Act of 1952.

summary.text: Includes Charles County, Maryland, within the National Capital region for purposes of comprehensive planning relating to the location of Federal agencies. Requires that specified proposed leases within the National Capital region by executive departments and agencies or by the United States Postal Service be submitted to the National Capital Planning Commission. Empowers the Commission to veto any such proposed lease.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Capital Planning Act of 1952.
